ComicInfo.Series: Starhenge Book One: The Dragon and the Boar
ComicInfo.Summary:
Revered creator LIAM SHARP cuts loose in his visually stunning six-issue masterpiece, STARHENGE, BOOK ONE!
A future Merlin travels to 5th-century Britain to prevent monstrous time-traveling killer robots from robbing the universe of magic, and Amber Weaver’s lively present-day narrative reveals how she becomes drawn into a war across time!
The Terminator meets The Green Knight in 30 enthralling story pages, setting the scene for this original epic inspired by the Arthurian sagas!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-14 09:58:28. [CVDB935027]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Liam Sharp, Matylda McCormack-Sharp, Liam Sharp, Matylda McCormack-Sharp
ComicInfo.Inker: Liam Sharp, Matylda McCormack-Sharp, Liam Sharp, Matylda McCormack-Sharp
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Ben Templesmith, Chris Weston, Christian Ward, Liam Sharp, Matylda McCormack-Sharp, Mike D. Perkins, Ryan Brown
